snippet: The five-time Olympic gold medalist Ian Thorpe, 31, will never swim again after contracting two potentially deadly infections during shoulder surgery, his agent said.
abstract: Five-time Olympic gold medalist Ian Thorpe will never swim again after contracting two potentially deadly infections during shoulder surgery,
lead_paragraph: The five-time Olympic gold medalist Ian Thorpe, 31, will never swim again after contracting two potentially deadly infections during shoulder surgery, his agent said.

headline.main: Surgical Infections End Ian Thorpe’s Career
